quotes.message: Believe in yourself! Have faith in your abilities! Without a humble but reasonable confidence in your own powers you cannot be successful or happy.
quotes.name: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.message: Cultivate an optimistic mind, use your imagination, always consider alternatives, and dare to believe that you can make possible what others think is impossible.
quotes.name: Rodolfo Costa

quotes.message: If you have a positive attitude and constantly strive to give your best effort, eventually you will overcome your immediate problems and find you are ready for greater challenges.
quotes.name: Pat Riley

quotes.message: When your attitude is positive, you will naturally have more courage to take the next best step toward your goal.
quotes.name: William DeFoore

quotes.message: A positive attitude causes a chain reaction of positive thoughts, events and outcomes. It is a catalyst and it sparks extraordinary results.
quotes.name: Wade Boggs

quotes.message: A positive attitude may not solve all our problems but that is the only option we have if we want to get out of problems.
quotes.name: Subodh Gupta

quotes.message: Having a positive attitude isn't wishy washy, it's a concrete and intelligent way to view problems, challenges and obstacles.
quotes.name: Jeff Moore

quotes.message: In order to carry a positive action we must develop here a positive vision.
quotes.name: Dalai Lama

quotes.message: If you look the right way, you can see that the whole world is a garden.
quotes.name: Frances Hodgson Burnett

quotes.message: Hope is a waking dream.
quotes.name: Aristotle

quotes.message: All of your dreams and desires are within your reach when you have a positive attitude in your toolkit.
quotes.name: William DeFoore

quotes.message: Keep your face to the sunshine and you cannot see a shadow.
quotes.name: Helen Keller

quotes.message: The best way to gain self-confidence is to do what you are afraid to do.
quotes.name: Anonymous

quotes.message: If you can dream it, then you can achieve it. You will get all you want in life if you help enough other people get what they want.
quotes.name: Zig Ziglar

quotes.message: A positive attitude turns I can't & I won't, into I have & I will!
quotes.name: Mandy Hale

quotes.message: When you are joyful, when you say yes to life and have fun and project positivity all around you, you become a sun in the center of every constellation, and people want to be near you.
quotes.name: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.message: Decision decides destiny. What God wants you to become is the positive person you decide to become when led by God's spirit.
quotes.name: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.message: A positive attitude awakens inner strength, energy, motivation and initiative.
quotes.name: Anonymous

quotes.message: Once you replace negative thoughts with positive ones, you'll start having positive results.
quotes.name: Willie Nelson

quotes.message: First steps are always the hardest but until they are taken the notion of progress remains only a notion and not an achievement.
quotes.name: Aberjhani

quotes.message: Adopting a really positive attitude can work wonders to adding years to your life, a spring to your step, a sparkle to your eye, and all of that.
quotes.name: Christie Brinkley

quotes.message: A positive attitude may not solve all your problems, but it will annoy enough people to make it worth the effort.
quotes.name: Herm Albright

quotes.message: It does not matter how long you are spending on the earth, how much money you have gathered or how much attention you have received. It is the amount of positive vibration you have radiated in life that matters.
quotes.name: Amit Ray

quotes.message: The will to win, the desire to succeed, the urge to reach your full potentialâ€¦ these are the keys that will unlock the door to personal excellence.
quotes.name: Confucius

quotes.message: You can do everything you can to try to stop bad things from happening to you, but eventually things will happen, so the best prevention is a positive attitude.
quotes.name: Marie Osmond

quotes.message: An attitude of positive expectation is the mark of the superior personality.
quotes.name: Brian Tracy

quotes.message: Our greatest weakness lies in giving up. The most certain way to succeed is always to try just one more time.
quotes.name: Thomas Edison

quotes.message: A positive attitude points you toward the best and brightest in the world around you, expanding your potential for growth and development in all areas of life.
quotes.name: William DeFoore

quotes.message: Chaotic people often have chaotic lives, and I think they create that. But if you try and have an inner peace and a positive attitude, I think you attract that.
quotes.name: Imelda Staunton

quotes.message: Virtually nothing is impossible in this world if you just put your mind to it and maintain a positive attitude.
quotes.name: Lou Holtz

quotes.message: Our beliefs about what we are and what we can be precisely determine what we can be.
quotes.name: Anthony Robbins

quotes.message: A positive attitude may not solve every problem but it makes solving any problem a more pleasant experience.
quotes.name: Grant Fairly

quotes.message: Keep your face always toward the sunshine - and shadows will fall behind you.
quotes.name: Walt Whitman

quotes.message: Perpetual optimism is a force multiplier.
quotes.name: Colin Powell

quotes.message: Always go into meetings or negotiations with a positive attitude. Tell yourself you're going to make this the best deal for all parties.
quotes.name: Natalie Massenet

quotes.message: Positive thinking will let you do everything better than negative thinking will.
quotes.name: Zig Ziglar

quotes.message: I do believe we're all connected. I do believe in positive energy. I do believe in the power of prayer. I do believe in putting good out into the world. And I believe in taking care of each other.
quotes.name: Harvey Fierstein

quotes.message: A positive attitude is something everyone can work on, and everyone can learn how to employ it.
quotes.name: Joan Lunden

quotes.message: A positive attitude can really make dreams come true - it did for me.
quotes.name: David Bailey

quotes.message: The thing that lies at the foundation of positive change, the way I see it, is service to a fellow human being.
quotes.name: Lee lacocca

quotes.message: A positive attitude about aging will help you navigate the territory of elderly parents in their later years.
quotes.name: William DeFoore

quotes.message: Pessimism leads to weakness, optimism to power.
quotes.name: William James

quotes.message: I hope the millions of people I've touched have the optimism and desire to share their goals and hard work and persevere with a positive attitude.
quotes.name: Michael Jordan

quotes.message: The pessimist sees difficulty in every opportunity; the optimist sees the opportunity in every difficulty.
quotes.name: Winston Churchil

quotes.message: Don't hang with negative people. They will pull you down with them. Instead, invite them into your light and together you will both shine strong.
quotes.name: L.F. Young

quotes.message: Positive thinking is more than just a tagline. It changes the way we behave. And I firmly believe that when I am positive, it not only makes me better, but it also makes those around me better.
quotes.name: Harvey Mackay

quotes.message: I'm a very positive thinker, and I think that is what helps me the most in difficult moments.
quotes.name: Roger Federer

quotes.message: I always like to look on the optimistic side of life, but I am realistic enough to know that life is a complex matter.
quotes.name: Walt Disney
